name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Memphis Primacy Parkway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First I want to say that I love the fact that La Quinta accepts pets.
reviews.title: safety issues need to be addressed

likes.disliked: — Lack of safety concerns on the part of the hotel.

reviews.text: We have used La Quinta multiple times in our travels. Our arrival and check-in was great. The rooms are a good size but I don't like the fact that their bathrooms do not have fans in them.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is the usual for La Quinta but not much variety.
reviews.title: nice place to stay
